content: *update january 7 2023 corrected error on chart legend changed mention of kitchener stitch to the correct mattress stitch and added written instructions * irish diamond headband is perfect for keeping your ears warm in chilly weather made for approximately 22 head can easily be modified with more or less row for a more custom fit the swatch is knit in seed stitch wool yarn is recommended for great stitch definition i used i love this wool in the color ivory and you can make a few headbands with one skein solid colors are recommended yarns that are too colorful may appear too noisy and lose the cables i d love to see your results please feel free to post your projects
